message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start with a price of $1100000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a living too! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $1050000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $1000000 for the product. Can you consider that?
